posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

3/28/22 - 4/03/22
Issue - V96
Current Release: 1.8.1

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps

Streamlit Updates

  • We’re now officially part of Snowflake! Read more about the acquisition here.
  • The #30daysofStreamlit challenge kicked off April 1st. Follow along on Twitter or LinkedIn for daily challenges.

Featured Content

  • Energytics @Benedict_Neo
  • Hiking Upward Recommender
  • Make Dataframes Interactive in Streamlit

Tutorials/Introduction

  • How to Build a Dashboard Web App in Python with Streamlit @Dataprofessor
  • 30DaysofStreamlit -Overview of Streamlit (What and Why?) @Jesse_JCharis
  • Build an Image Color Analyzer App with Streamlit and Python (30DaysofStreamlit) @Jesse_JCharis
  • Streamlit Forms-I | Complete Streamlit Python Course | Streamlit Tutorial 12

  • Trying Out Streamlit Option Menu

  • Taller Práctico: Crear una demo en Spaces con Streamlit - Hackathon PLN en Español
  • Klasifikasi Bunga IRIS dengan Streamlit (WebApps) | Cara Mudah Buat Aplikasi Web Skripsi Data Mining
  • From creation to deployment of ML models in most easiest way with case study
  • Streamlit — secrets — Dropbox— DNN models
  • How to setup Streamlit in minutes, your question answered here
  • Bot and 360 Employee Review
  • Streamlit! Pythonで作る簡単Webアプリ。
